                function truncateWords(text, wordLimit) {
                    var words = text.split(' ');
                    if (words.length > wordLimit) {
                        return words.slice(0, wordLimit).join(' ') + ' ...';  // Truncate and append ellipsis
                    }
                    return text;  // Return the full text if it's within the limit
                }

                var page = 2;  // Start from page 2 as page 1 is loaded initially
                var isLoading = false; 
                var hasMoreData = true;

                const cartServiceIds = '[]';
                const wishlistServiceIds = '[]';
            
                // Function to check if an item is in an array
                function isInArray(array, value) {
                    return array.includes(value);
                }
            

                function loadMoreServices() {
                    if (!hasMoreData || isLoading) return;
                    isLoading = true;

                    $.ajax({
                        url: "/load-more-services/",
                        type: 'get',
                        data: { 'page': page, 'categoryname': 'None', 'q': '' }, 
                        dataType: 'json',
                        success: function(data) {
                            // console.log("Received data:", data);  // Log the data for debugging

                            if (data.length === 0) {
                                hasMoreData = false;  // No more data to load
                            } else {
                                // Check if the service-list container exists
                                var serviceList = $("#service-list");
                                if (serviceList.length === 0) {
                                    console.error("Service list container not found");
                                    return;
                                }

                                $.each(data, function(index, item) {
                                    var truncatedDescription = truncateWords(item.description, 16); 
                                    var isInCart = isInArray(cartServiceIds, item.id);
                                    var isInWishlist = isInArray(wishlistServiceIds, item.id);
                            
                                    var cartIcon = isInCart ? '<i class="fas fa-cart-arrow-down" style="color: red;"></i>' : '<i class="fas fa-cart-arrow-down"></i>';
                                    var wishlistIcon = isInWishlist ? '<i class="fas fa-heart" style="color: red;"></i>' : '<i class="fas fa-heart"></i>';

                                    var serviceLink = item.slug ? `/service-details/${item.slug}/` : `/${item.redirect_link}/`;
                                    // console.log(serviceLink);

                                    var buttonGroupHTML = "";
                                    if (item.buy_option) {
                                        buttonGroupHTML = `
                                            <div class="button-group cartinfo--left">
                                                <button class="addToCart btn-button" type="button" title="Add to Cart" data-id="${item.id}" data-type="service">
                                                ${cartIcon}
                                                <span>Add to Cart</span>
                                                </button>

                                                <button class="wishlist btn-button" type="button" title="Add to Wish List" data-id="${item.id}" data-type="service" onclick="toggleWishlist(event, this)">
                                                ${wishlistIcon}
                                                <span>Add to Wish List</span>
                                                </button>

                                                <a class="quickview iframe-link visible-lg btn-button" title="${item.servicename}" href="${serviceLink}">
                                                <i class="far fa-eye"></i>
                                                <span>Quickview</span>
                                                </a>
                                            </div>`;
                                    }
                                    
                                    var html = `
                                    <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-3">
                                        <div class="blog-author-boxarea h-100" data-aos="fade" data-aos-duration="800">
                                            <div class="img1">

                                                <div class="image-container">
                                                    <img src="${item.service_main_image}" alt="" class="service-image" width="253" height="200">
                                                </div>

                                                ${buttonGroupHTML}

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="content-area">
                                                <a href="${serviceLink}">
                                                    ${item.servicename}
                                                </a>
                                                <p class="description" id="description-${page}-${index}" data-full-description="${item.description}">${truncatedDescription}</p>

                                                <div class="d-flex gap-2">
                                                    <a href="${serviceLink}" class="readmore" data-inr-price="${item.price}" data-usd-price="${item.price}">
                                                        <span style="color:#3D4C5E">Starts from</span> 
                                                        <span class="price-label" id="price-label-${item.id}">${item.price}</span>
                                                    </a>
                                                </div>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>`;

                                    $("#service-list").append(html);

                                });

                                page += 1;  
                            }
                            isLoading = false;
                        },
                        error: function() {
                            console.error("Error loading more services");
                            isLoading = false;
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                $(window).scroll(function() {
                    var scrollPosition = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height();
                    var halfwayPoint = $(document).height() / 3;

                    if (scrollPosition >= halfwayPoint) {
                        loadMoreServices();
                    }
                });

             


             
                $(document).ready(function() {
                    // Delegate the event to dynamically loaded "Add to Cart" buttons
                    $(document).on('click', '.addToCart', function() {
                        const button = $(this);
                        const itemId = button.data('id');
                        const itemType = button.data('type');
                        const isInCart = button.hasClass('in-cart');
                        const icon = button.find('i');
                        
                        const isRed = icon.css('color') === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)';  // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' is red
                        const action = isRed ? 'remove' : 'increase';
                        
                        const url = action === 'remove' ? '/remove-from-cart/' : '/add-into-cart/';

                        // Make the AJAX call to add or remove the item from the cart
                        $.ajax({
                            url: url,
                            method: 'POST',
                            headers: {
                                'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                            },
                            data: JSON.stringify({
                                item_id: itemId,
                                item_type: itemType,
                                action: action
                            }),
                            contentType: 'application/json',
                            success: function(data) {
                                if (data.success) {
                                    if (action === 'remove') {
                                        button.removeClass('in-cart');
                                        button.find('i').css('color', '');  // Remove color
                                        alert('Item removed from cart successfully!');
                                    } else {
                                        button.addClass('in-cart');
                                        button.find('i').css('color', 'red');  // Add color
                                        alert('Item added to cart successfully!');
                                    }
                                updateCartCount();
                                } else {
                                    alert('Failed to update the cart!');
                                }
                            },
                            error: function() {
                                alert('Something went wrong!');
                            }
                        });
                    });
                });

                // Function to handle wishlist toggle
                function toggleWishlist(event, element) {
                    const button = $(element);
                    const itemId = button.data('id');
                    const itemType = button.data('type');
                    const isInWishlist = button.hasClass('in-wishlist');
                    const icon = button.find('i');

                    const isRed = icon.css('color') === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)';  // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' is red
                    const action = isRed ? 'remove' : 'add';
                    

                    const url = action === 'remove' ? '/remove-from-wishlist/' : '/add-to-wishlist/';

                    // AJAX call for wishlist toggle
                    $.ajax({
                        url: url,
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: {
                            'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                        },
                        data: JSON.stringify({
                            item_id: itemId,
                            item_type: itemType,
                        }),
                        contentType: 'application/json',
                        success: function(data) {
                            if (data.success) {
                                if (action === 'remove') {
                                    button.removeClass('in-wishlist');
                                    button.find('i').css('color', '');  // Remove color
                                    alert('Item removed from wishlist successfully!');
                                } else {
                                    button.addClass('in-wishlist');
                                    button.find('i').css('color', 'red');  // Add color
                                    alert('Item added to wishlist successfully!');
                                }
                            updateWishlistCount();
                            } else {
                                alert('Failed to update the wishlist!');
                            }
                        },
                        error: function() {
                            alert('Something went wrong!');
                        }
                    });
                }

                // Function to get CSRF token from cookies
                function getCookie(name) {
                    let cookieValue = null;
                    if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                        const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                        for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                            const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                            if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                                cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                                break;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    return cookieValue;
                }

                function truncateWords(text, wordLimit) {
                    var words = text.split(' ');
                    if (words.length > wordLimit) {
                        return words.slice(0, wordLimit).join(' ') + ' ...';  // Truncate and append ellipsis
                    }
                    return text;  // Return the full text if it's within the limit
                }

                var page = 2;  // Start from page 2 as page 1 is loaded initially
                var isLoading = false; 
                var hasMoreData = true;

                const cartServiceIds = '[]';
                const wishlistServiceIds = '[]';
            
                // Function to check if an item is in an array
                function isInArray(array, value) {
                    return array.includes(value);
                }
            

                function loadMoreServices() {
                    if (!hasMoreData || isLoading) return;
                    isLoading = true;

                    $.ajax({
                        url: "/load-more-services/",
                        type: 'get',
                        data: { 'page': page, 'categoryname': 'None', 'q': '' }, 
                        dataType: 'json',
                        success: function(data) {
                            // console.log("Received data:", data);  // Log the data for debugging

                            if (data.length === 0) {
                                hasMoreData = false;  // No more data to load
                            } else {
                                // Check if the service-list container exists
                                var serviceList = $("#service-list");
                                if (serviceList.length === 0) {
                                    console.error("Service list container not found");
                                    return;
                                }

                                $.each(data, function(index, item) {
                                    var truncatedDescription = truncateWords(item.description, 16); 
                                    var isInCart = isInArray(cartServiceIds, item.id);
                                    var isInWishlist = isInArray(wishlistServiceIds, item.id);
                            
                                    var cartIcon = isInCart ? '<i class="fas fa-cart-arrow-down" style="color: red;"></i>' : '<i class="fas fa-cart-arrow-down"></i>';
                                    var wishlistIcon = isInWishlist ? '<i class="fas fa-heart" style="color: red;"></i>' : '<i class="fas fa-heart"></i>';

                                    var serviceLink = item.slug ? `/service-details/${item.slug}/` : `/${item.redirect_link}/`;
                                    // console.log(serviceLink);

                                    var buttonGroupHTML = "";
                                    if (item.buy_option) {
                                        buttonGroupHTML = `
                                            <div class="button-group cartinfo--left">
                                                <button class="addToCart btn-button" type="button" title="Add to Cart" data-id="${item.id}" data-type="service">
                                                ${cartIcon}
                                                <span>Add to Cart</span>
                                                </button>

                                                <button class="wishlist btn-button" type="button" title="Add to Wish List" data-id="${item.id}" data-type="service" onclick="toggleWishlist(event, this)">
                                                ${wishlistIcon}
                                                <span>Add to Wish List</span>
                                                </button>

                                                <a class="quickview iframe-link visible-lg btn-button" title="${item.servicename}" href="${serviceLink}">
                                                <i class="far fa-eye"></i>
                                                <span>Quickview</span>
                                                </a>
                                            </div>`;
                                    }
                                    
                                    var html = `
                                    <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-3">
                                        <div class="blog-author-boxarea h-100" data-aos="fade" data-aos-duration="800">
                                            <div class="img1">

                                                <div class="image-container">
                                                    <img src="${item.service_main_image}" alt="" class="service-image" width="253" height="200">
                                                </div>

                                                ${buttonGroupHTML}

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="content-area">
                                                <a href="${serviceLink}">
                                                    ${item.servicename}
                                                </a>
                                                <p class="description" id="description-${page}-${index}" data-full-description="${item.description}">${truncatedDescription}</p>

                                                <div class="d-flex gap-2">
                                                    <a href="${serviceLink}" class="readmore" data-inr-price="${item.price}" data-usd-price="${item.price}">
                                                        <span style="color:#3D4C5E">Starts from</span> 
                                                        <span class="price-label" id="price-label-${item.id}">${item.price}</span>
                                                    </a>
                                                </div>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>`;

                                    $("#service-list").append(html);

                                });

                                page += 1;  
                            }
                            isLoading = false;
                        },
                        error: function() {
                            console.error("Error loading more services");
                            isLoading = false;
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                $(window).scroll(function() {
                    var scrollPosition = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height();
                    var halfwayPoint = $(document).height() / 3;

                    if (scrollPosition >= halfwayPoint) {
                        loadMoreServices();
                    }
                });

             


             
                $(document).ready(function() {
                    // Delegate the event to dynamically loaded "Add to Cart" buttons
                    $(document).on('click', '.addToCart', function() {
                        const button = $(this);
                        const itemId = button.data('id');
                        const itemType = button.data('type');
                        const isInCart = button.hasClass('in-cart');
                        const icon = button.find('i');
                        
                        const isRed = icon.css('color') === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)';  // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' is red
                        const action = isRed ? 'remove' : 'increase';
                        
                        const url = action === 'remove' ? '/remove-from-cart/' : '/add-into-cart/';

                        // Make the AJAX call to add or remove the item from the cart
                        $.ajax({
                            url: url,
                            method: 'POST',
                            headers: {
                                'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                            },
                            data: JSON.stringify({
                                item_id: itemId,
                                item_type: itemType,
                                action: action
                            }),
                            contentType: 'application/json',
                            success: function(data) {
                                if (data.success) {
                                    if (action === 'remove') {
                                        button.removeClass('in-cart');
                                        button.find('i').css('color', '');  // Remove color
                                        alert('Item removed from cart successfully!');
                                    } else {
                                        button.addClass('in-cart');
                                        button.find('i').css('color', 'red');  // Add color
                                        alert('Item added to cart successfully!');
                                    }
                                updateCartCount();
                                } else {
                                    alert('Failed to update the cart!');
                                }
                            },
                            error: function() {
                                alert('Something went wrong!');
                            }
                        });
                    });
                });

                // Function to handle wishlist toggle
                function toggleWishlist(event, element) {
                    const button = $(element);
                    const itemId = button.data('id');
                    const itemType = button.data('type');
                    const isInWishlist = button.hasClass('in-wishlist');
                    const icon = button.find('i');

                    const isRed = icon.css('color') === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)';  // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' is red
                    const action = isRed ? 'remove' : 'add';
                    

                    const url = action === 'remove' ? '/remove-from-wishlist/' : '/add-to-wishlist/';

                    // AJAX call for wishlist toggle
                    $.ajax({
                        url: url,
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: {
                            'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                        },
                        data: JSON.stringify({
                            item_id: itemId,
                            item_type: itemType,
                        }),
                        contentType: 'application/json',
                        success: function(data) {
                            if (data.success) {
                                if (action === 'remove') {
                                    button.removeClass('in-wishlist');
                                    button.find('i').css('color', '');  // Remove color
                                    alert('Item removed from wishlist successfully!');
                                } else {
                                    button.addClass('in-wishlist');
                                    button.find('i').css('color', 'red');  // Add color
                                    alert('Item added to wishlist successfully!');
                                }
                            updateWishlistCount();
                            } else {
                                alert('Failed to update the wishlist!');
                            }
                        },
                        error: function() {
                            alert('Something went wrong!');
                        }
                    });
                }

                // Function to get CSRF token from cookies
                function getCookie(name) {
                    let cookieValue = null;
                    if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                        const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                        for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                            const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                            if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                                cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                                break;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    return cookieValue;
                }

                function truncateWords(text, wordLimit) {
                    var words = text.split(' ');

                var page = 2;  // Start from page 2 as page 1 is loaded initially
                var isLoading = false; 
                var hasMoreData = true;

                const cartServiceIds = '[]';
                const wishlistServiceIds = '[]';
            
                // Function to check if an item is in an array
                function isInArray(array, value) {
                    return array.includes(value);
                }
            

                function loadMoreServices() {
                    if (!hasMoreData || isLoading) return;
                    isLoading = true;

                    $.ajax({
                        url: "/load-more-services/",
                        type: 'get',
                        data: { 'page': page, 'categoryname': 'None', 'q': '' }, 
                        dataType: 'json',
                        success: function(data) {
                            // console.log("Received data:", data);  // Log the data for debugging

                            if (data.length === 0) {
                                hasMoreData = false;  // No more data to load
                            } else {
                                // Check if the service-list container exists
                                var serviceList = $("#service-list");
                                if (serviceList.length === 0) {
                                    console.error("Service list container not found");
                                    return;
                                }

                                $.each(data, function(index, item) {
                                    var truncatedDescription = truncateWords(item.description, 16); 
                                    var isInCart = isInArray(cartServiceIds, item.id);
                                    var isInWishlist = isInArray(wishlistServiceIds, item.id);
                            
                                    var cartIcon = isInCart ? '<i class="fas fa-cart-arrow-down" style="color: red;"></i>' : '<i class="fas fa-cart-arrow-down"></i>';
                                    var wishlistIcon = isInWishlist ? '<i class="fas fa-heart" style="color: red;"></i>' : '<i class="fas fa-heart"></i>';

                                    var serviceLink = item.slug ? `/service-details/${item.slug}/` : `/${item.redirect_link}/`;
                                    // console.log(serviceLink);

                                    var buttonGroupHTML = "";
                                    if (item.buy_option) {
                                        buttonGroupHTML = `
                                            <div class="button-group cartinfo--left">
                                                <button class="addToCart btn-button" type="button" title="Add to Cart" data-id="${item.id}" data-type="service">
                                                ${cartIcon}
                                                <span>Add to Cart</span>
                                                </button>

                                                <button class="wishlist btn-button" type="button" title="Add to Wish List" data-id="${item.id}" data-type="service" onclick="toggleWishlist(event, this)">
                                                ${wishlistIcon}
                                                <span>Add to Wish List</span>
                                                </button>

                                                <a class="quickview iframe-link visible-lg btn-button" title="${item.servicename}" href="${serviceLink}">
                                                <i class="far fa-eye"></i>
                                                <span>Quickview</span>
                                                </a>
                                            </div>`;
                                    }
                                    
                                    var html = `
                                    <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-3">
                                        <div class="blog-author-boxarea h-100" data-aos="fade" data-aos-duration="800">
                                            <div class="img1">

                                                <div class="image-container">
                                                    <img src="${item.service_main_image}" alt="" class="service-image" width="253" height="200">
                                                </div>

                                                ${buttonGroupHTML}

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="content-area">
                                                <a href="${serviceLink}">
                                                    ${item.servicename}
                                                </a>
                                                <p class="description" id="description-${page}-${index}" data-full-description="${item.description}">${truncatedDescription}</p>

                                                <div class="d-flex gap-2">
                                                    <a href="${serviceLink}" class="readmore" data-inr-price="${item.price}" data-usd-price="${item.price}">
                                                        <span style="color:#3D4C5E">Starts from</span> 
                                                        <span class="price-label" id="price-label-${item.id}">${item.price}</span>
                                                    </a>
                                                </div>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>`;

                                    $("#service-list").append(html);

                                });

                                page += 1;  
                            }
                            isLoading = false;
                        },
                        error: function() {
                            console.error("Error loading more services");
                            isLoading = false;
                        }
                    });
                }

                $(document).ready(function() {
                    // Delegate the event to dynamically loaded "Add to Cart" buttons
                    $(document).on('click', '.addToCart', function() {
                        const button = $(this);
                        const itemId = button.data('id');
                        const itemType = button.data('type');
                        const isInCart = button.hasClass('in-cart');
                        const icon = button.find('i');
                        
                        const isRed = icon.css('color') === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)';  // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' is red
                        const action = isRed ? 'remove' : 'increase';
                        
                        const url = action === 'remove' ? '/remove-from-cart/' : '/add-into-cart/';

                        // Make the AJAX call to add or remove the item from the cart
                        $.ajax({
                            url: url,
                            method: 'POST',
                            headers: {
                                'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                            },
                            data: JSON.stringify({
                                item_id: itemId,
                                item_type: itemType,
                                action: action
                            }),
                            contentType: 'application/json',
                            success: function(data) {
                                if (data.success) {
                                    if (action === 'remove') {
                                        button.removeClass('in-cart');
                                        button.find('i').css('color', '');  // Remove color
                                        alert('Item removed from cart successfully!');
                                    } else {
                                        button.addClass('in-cart');
                                        button.find('i').css('color', 'red');  // Add color
                                        alert('Item added to cart successfully!');
                                    }
                                updateCartCount();
                                } else {
                                    alert('Failed to update the cart!');
                                }
                            },
                            error: function() {
                                alert('Something went wrong!');
                            }
                        });
                    });
                });

                // Function to handle wishlist toggle
                function toggleWishlist(event, element) {
                    const button = $(element);
                    const itemId = button.data('id');
                    const itemType = button.data('type');
                    const isInWishlist = button.hasClass('in-wishlist');
                    const icon = button.find('i');

                    const isRed = icon.css('color') === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)';  // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' is red
                    const action = isRed ? 'remove' : 'add';
                    

                    const url = action === 'remove' ? '/remove-from-wishlist/' : '/add-to-wishlist/';

                    // AJAX call for wishlist toggle
                    $.ajax({
                        url: url,
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: {
                            'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                        },
                        data: JSON.stringify({
                            item_id: itemId,
                            item_type: itemType,
                        }),
                        contentType: 'application/json',
                        success: function(data) {
                            if (data.success) {
                                if (action === 'remove') {
                                    button.removeClass('in-wishlist');
                                    button.find('i').css('color', '');  // Remove color
                                    alert('Item removed from wishlist successfully!');
                                } else {
                                    button.addClass('in-wishlist');
                                    button.find('i').css('color', 'red');  // Add color
                                    alert('Item added to wishlist successfully!');
                                }
                            updateWishlistCount();
                            } else {
                                alert('Failed to update the wishlist!');
                            }
                        },
                        error: function() {
                            alert('Something went wrong!');
                        }
                    });
                }

                // Function to get CSRF token from cookies
                function getCookie(name) {
                    let cookieValue = null;
                    if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                        const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                        for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                            const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                            if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                                cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                                break;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    return cookieValue;
                }

                                    return;
                                }

                                $.each(data, function(index, item) {
                                    var truncatedDescription = truncateWords(item.description, 16); 
                                    var isInCart = isInArray(cartServiceIds, item.id);
                                    var isInWishlist = isInArray(wishlistServiceIds, item.id);
                            
                                    var cartIcon = isInCart ? '<i class="fas fa-cart-arrow-down" style="color: red;"></i>' : '<i class="fas fa-cart-arrow-down"></i>';
                                    var wishlistIcon = isInWishlist ? '<i class="fas fa-heart" style="color: red;"></i>' : '<i class="fas fa-heart"></i>';

                                    var serviceLink = item.slug ? `/service-details/${item.slug}/` : `/${item.redirect_link}/`;
                                    // console.log(serviceLink);

                                    var buttonGroupHTML = "";
                                    if (item.buy_option) {
                                        buttonGroupHTML = `
                                            <div class="button-group cartinfo--left">
                                                <button class="addToCart btn-button" type="button" title="Add to Cart" data-id="${item.id}" data-type="service">
                                                ${cartIcon}
                                                <span>Add to Cart</span>
                                                </button>

                                                <button class="wishlist btn-button" type="button" title="Add to Wish List" data-id="${item.id}" data-type="service" onclick="toggleWishlist(event, this)">
                                                ${wishlistIcon}
                                                <span>Add to Wish List</span>
                                                </button>

                                                <a class="quickview iframe-link visible-lg btn-button" title="${item.servicename}" href="${serviceLink}">
                                                <i class="far fa-eye"></i>
                                                <span>Quickview</span>
                                                </a>
                                            </div>`;
                                    }
                                    
                                    var html = `
                                    <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-3">
                                        <div class="blog-author-boxarea h-100" data-aos="fade" data-aos-duration="800">
                                            <div class="img1">

                                                <div class="image-container">
                                                    <img src="${item.service_main_image}" alt="" class="service-image" width="253" height="200">
                                                </div>

                                                ${buttonGroupHTML}

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="content-area">
                                                <a href="${serviceLink}">
                                                    ${item.servicename}
                                                </a>
                                                <p class="description" id="description-${page}-${index}" data-full-description="${item.description}">${truncatedDescription}</p>

                                                <div class="d-flex gap-2">
                                                    <a href="${serviceLink}" class="readmore" data-inr-price="${item.price}" data-usd-price="${item.price}">
                                                        <span style="color:#3D4C5E">Starts from</span> 
                                                        <span class="price-label" id="price-label-${item.id}">${item.price}</span>
                                                    </a>
                                                </div>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>`;

                                    $("#service-list").append(html);

                                });

                                page += 1;  
                            }
                            isLoading = false;
                        },
                        error: function() {
                            console.error("Error loading more services");
                            isLoading = false;
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                $(window).scroll(function() {
                    var scrollPosition = $(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height();
                    var halfwayPoint = $(document).height() / 3;

                    if (scrollPosition >= halfwayPoint) {
                        loadMoreServices();
                    }
                });

             


             
                $(document).ready(function() {
                    // Delegate the event to dynamically loaded "Add to Cart" buttons
                    $(document).on('click', '.addToCart', function() {
                        const button = $(this);
                        const itemId = button.data('id');
                        const itemType = button.data('type');
                        const isInCart = button.hasClass('in-cart');
                        const icon = button.find('i');
                        
                        const isRed = icon.css('color') === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)';  // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' is red
                        const action = isRed ? 'remove' : 'increase';
                        
                        const url = action === 'remove' ? '/remove-from-cart/' : '/add-into-cart/';

                        // Make the AJAX call to add or remove the item from the cart
                        $.ajax({
                            url: url,
                            method: 'POST',
                            headers: {
                                'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                            },
                            data: JSON.stringify({
                                item_id: itemId,
                                item_type: itemType,
                                action: action
                            }),
                            contentType: 'application/json',
                            success: function(data) {
                                if (data.success) {
                                    if (action === 'remove') {
                                        button.removeClass('in-cart');
                                        button.find('i').css('color', '');  // Remove color
                                        alert('Item removed from cart successfully!');
                                    } else {
                                        button.addClass('in-cart');
                                        button.find('i').css('color', 'red');  // Add color
                                        alert('Item added to cart successfully!');
                                    }
                                updateCartCount();
                                } else {
                                    alert('Failed to update the cart!');
                                }
                            },
                            error: function() {
                                alert('Something went wrong!');
                            }
                        });
                    });
                });

                // Function to handle wishlist toggle
                function toggleWishlist(event, element) {
                    const button = $(element);
                    const itemId = button.data('id');
                    const itemType = button.data('type');
                    const isInWishlist = button.hasClass('in-wishlist');
                    const icon = button.find('i');

                    const isRed = icon.css('color') === 'rgb(255, 0, 0)';  // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)' is red
                    const action = isRed ? 'remove' : 'add';
                    

                    const url = action === 'remove' ? '/remove-from-wishlist/' : '/add-to-wishlist/';

                    // AJAX call for wishlist toggle
                    $.ajax({
                        url: url,
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: {
                            'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                        },
                        data: JSON.stringify({
                            item_id: itemId,
                            item_type: itemType,
                        }),
                        contentType: 'application/json',
                        success: function(data) {
                            if (data.success) {
                                if (action === 'remove') {
                                    button.removeClass('in-wishlist');
                                    button.find('i').css('color', '');  // Remove color
                                    alert('Item removed from wishlist successfully!');
                                } else {
                                    button.addClass('in-wishlist');
                                    button.find('i').css('color', 'red');  // Add color
                                    alert('Item added to wishlist successfully!');
                                }
                            updateWishlistCount();
                            } else {
                                alert('Failed to update the wishlist!');
                            }
                        },
                        error: function() {
                            alert('Something went wrong!');
                        }
                    });
                }

                // Function to get CSRF token from cookies
                function getCookie(name) {
                    let cookieValue = null;
                    if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                        const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                        for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                            const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                            if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                                cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                                break;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    return cookieValue;
                }
